Segment.name: CLP
Segment.comment: To supply information common to all services of a claim

Field.name: ClaimSubmittersIdentifier
Field.comment: Identifier used to track a claim from creation by the health care provider through payment

Field.name: ClaimStatusCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of an entire claim as assigned by the payor, claim review organization or repricing organization

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: FacilityCodeValue
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of facility where services were performed; the first and second positions of the Uniform Bill Type code or the Place of Service code from the Electronic Media Claims National Standard Format

Field.name: ClaimFrequencyTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the frequency of the claim; this is the third position of the Uniform Billing Claim Form Bill Type

Field.name: PatientStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating patient status as of the "statement covers through date"

Field.name: DiagnosisRelatedGroup
Field.comment: Code indicating a patient's diagnosis group based on a patient's illness, diseases, and medical problems

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response
